item.title: Four things a cleaning and exam every six months can save you:
item.description:
1. Save you time: The time it takes for two cleanings and exams every year is a fraction of the time it takes for major dental work required because of allowing a small problem become a larger one. In this fast paced society time is valuable. Most major work (crowns, root canals, dentures, and such) require anywhere from two to four visits, each requiring an hour or more. A simple 40 minute cleaning and exam can prevent this.
  2. Save you expense: The expense of two cleanings and exams per year is a fraction of the expense for major dental work due to neglect. It is an investment that really pays off.
  3. Save you from pain: Catching things early with two cleanings and exams per year can save you from serious pain—Toothaches are no fun!
  4. Save your teeth: catching things early with two cleanings and exams per year can save your teeth—Losing teeth is no fun!

So make a cleaning and exam every six months your routine, and SAVE!

cleanings
dental cleanings
dental hygienist
